trans-unit.source: Move data to an Azure SQL Database for Azure Machine Learning | Azure

trans-unit.source: Create SQL Table and load data to SQL Table
trans-unit.target: Create SQL Table and load data to SQL Table

trans-unit.source: Move data to an Azure SQL Database for Azure Machine Learning
trans-unit.target: Move data to an Azure SQL Database for Azure Machine Learning

trans-unit.source: In this topic we outline the options for moving data either from flat files (CSV or TSV formats) or from data stored in an on-premise SQL Server to an Azure SQL database.
trans-unit.target: In this topic we outline the options for moving data either from flat files (CSV or TSV formats) or from data stored in an on-premise SQL Server to an Azure SQL database.

trans-unit.source: These tasks for moving data to the cloud are part of the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology (ADAPT) provided by Azure Machine Learning.
trans-unit.target: These tasks for moving data to the cloud are part of the Advanced Analytics Process and Technology (ADAPT) provided by Azure Machine Learning.

trans-unit.source: For a topic that outlines the options for moving data to an on-premise SQL Server for Machine Learning, see [Move data to SQL Server on an Azure virtual machine](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md).
trans-unit.target: For a topic that outlines the options for moving data to an on-premise SQL Server for Machine Learning, see [Move data to SQL Server on an Azure virtual machine](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md).

trans-unit.source: The following table summarizes the options for moving data to an Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: The following table summarizes the options for moving data to an Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: SOURCE
trans-unit.target: SOURCE

trans-unit.source: DESTINATION: Azure SQL Database
trans-unit.target: DESTINATION: Azure SQL Database

trans-unit.source: Flat file (CSV or TSV formatted)
trans-unit.target: Flat file (CSV or TSV formatted)

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: This procedures outlined here require that you have:
trans-unit.target: This procedures outlined here require that you have:

trans-unit.source: An **Azure subscription**.
trans-unit.target: An **Azure subscription**.

trans-unit.source: If you do not have a subscription, you can sign up for a [free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).
trans-unit.target: If you do not have a subscription, you can sign up for a [free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/).

trans-unit.source: An **Azure storage account**.
trans-unit.target: An **Azure storage account**.

trans-unit.source: You will use an Azure storage account for storing the data in this tutorial.
trans-unit.target: You will use an Azure storage account for storing the data in this tutorial.

trans-unit.source: If you don't have an Azure storage account, see the [Create a storage account](storage-create-storage-account.md#create-a-storage-account) article.
trans-unit.target: If you don't have an Azure storage account, see the [Create a storage account](storage-create-storage-account.md#create-a-storage-account) article.

trans-unit.source: After you have created the storage account, you will need to obtain the account key used to access the storage.
trans-unit.target: After you have created the storage account, you will need to obtain the account key used to access the storage.

trans-unit.source: See [View, copy and regenerate storage access keys](storage-create-storage-account.md#view-copy-and-regenerate-storage-access-keys).
trans-unit.target: See [View, copy and regenerate storage access keys](storage-create-storage-account.md#view-copy-and-regenerate-storage-access-keys).

trans-unit.source: Access to an **Azure SQL Database**.
trans-unit.target: Access to an **Azure SQL Database**.

trans-unit.source: If you must setup an Azure SQL Database, [Getting Started with Microsoft Azure SQL Database ](sql-database-get-started.md) provides information on how to provision a new instance of a Azure SQL Database.
trans-unit.target: If you must setup an Azure SQL Database, [Getting Started with Microsoft Azure SQL Database ](sql-database-get-started.md) provides information on how to provision a new instance of a Azure SQL Database.

trans-unit.source: Installed and configured **Azure PowerShell** locally.
trans-unit.target: Installed and configured **Azure PowerShell** locally.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](powershell-install-configure.md).
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see [How to install and configure Azure PowerShell](powershell-install-configure.md).

trans-unit.source: **Data**: The migration processes are demonstrated using the [NYC Taxi dataset](http://chriswhong.com/open-data/foil_nyc_taxi/).
trans-unit.target: **Data**: The migration processes are demonstrated using the [NYC Taxi dataset](http://chriswhong.com/open-data/foil_nyc_taxi/).

trans-unit.source: The NYC Taxi dataset contains information on trip data and fairs and is available, as noted that post, on Azure blob storage [here](http://www.andresmh.com/nyctaxitrips/).
trans-unit.target: The NYC Taxi dataset contains information on trip data and fairs and is available, as noted that post, on Azure blob storage [here](http://www.andresmh.com/nyctaxitrips/).

trans-unit.source: A sample and description of these files are provided in [NYC Taxi Trips Dataset Description](machine-learning-data-science-process-sql-walkthrough.md#dataset).
trans-unit.target: A sample and description of these files are provided in [NYC Taxi Trips Dataset Description](machine-learning-data-science-process-sql-walkthrough.md#dataset).

trans-unit.source: You can either adapt the procedures described here to a set of your own data or follow the steps as described by using the NYC Taxi dataset.
trans-unit.target: You can either adapt the procedures described here to a set of your own data or follow the steps as described by using the NYC Taxi dataset.

trans-unit.source: To upload the NYC Taxi dataset into your on-premise SQL Server database, follow the procedure outlined in [Bulk Import Data into SQL Server Database](machine-learning-data-science-process-sql-walkthrough.md#dbload).
trans-unit.target: To upload the NYC Taxi dataset into your on-premise SQL Server database, follow the procedure outlined in [Bulk Import Data into SQL Server Database](machine-learning-data-science-process-sql-walkthrough.md#dbload).

trans-unit.source: These instructions are for a SQL Server on an Azure Virtual Machine, but the procedure for uploading to the on-premise SQL Server is the same.
trans-unit.target: These instructions are for a SQL Server on an Azure Virtual Machine, but the procedure for uploading to the on-premise SQL Server is the same.

trans-unit.source: Moving data from a flat file source to an Azure SQL database
trans-unit.target: Moving data from a flat file source to an Azure SQL database

trans-unit.source: Data in flat files (CSV or TSV formatted) can be moved to an Azure SQL database using a Bulk Insert SQL Query.
trans-unit.target: Data in flat files (CSV or TSV formatted) can be moved to an Azure SQL database using a Bulk Insert SQL Query.

trans-unit.source: Bulk Insert SQL Query
trans-unit.target: Bulk Insert SQL Query

trans-unit.source: The steps for the procedure using the Bulk Insert SQL Query are similar to those covered in the sections for moving data from a flat file source to SQL Server on an Azure VM.
trans-unit.target: The steps for the procedure using the Bulk Insert SQL Query are similar to those covered in the sections for moving data from a flat file source to SQL Server on an Azure VM.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Bulk Insert SQL Query](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#insert-tables-bulkquery).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Bulk Insert SQL Query](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#insert-tables-bulkquery).

trans-unit.source: Moving Data from on-premise SQL Server to an Azure SQL database
trans-unit.target: Moving Data from on-premise SQL Server to an Azure SQL database

trans-unit.source: If the source data is stored in an on-premise SQL Server, there are various possibilities for moving the data to an Azure SQL database:
trans-unit.target: If the source data is stored in an on-premise SQL Server, there are various possibilities for moving the data to an Azure SQL database:

trans-unit.target: Export to Flat File

trans-unit.target: The steps for the first three are very similar to those sections in [Move data to SQL Server on an Azure virtual machine](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md) that cover these same procedures.

trans-unit.target: Links to the appropriate sections in that topic are provided below.

trans-unit.target: Export to Flat File

trans-unit.source: The steps for this exporting to a flat file are similar to those covered [Export to Flat File](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#export-flat-file).
trans-unit.target: The steps for this exporting to a flat file are similar to those covered [Export to Flat File](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#export-flat-file).

trans-unit.target: SQL Database Migration Wizard

trans-unit.source: The steps for using the SQL Database Migration Wizard are similar to those covered [SQL Database Migration Wizard](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#sql-migration).
trans-unit.target: The steps for using the SQL Database Migration Wizard are similar to those covered [SQL Database Migration Wizard](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#sql-migration).

trans-unit.target: Database backup and restore

trans-unit.source: The steps for using database backup and restore are similar to those covered [Database backup and restore](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#sql-backup).
trans-unit.target: The steps for using database backup and restore are similar to those covered [Database backup and restore](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-server-virtual-machine.md#sql-backup).

trans-unit.source: Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Azure Data Factory

trans-unit.source: The procedure for moving data to an Azure SQL database with Azure Data Factory (ADF) is provided in the topic [Move data from an on-premise SQL server to SQL Azure with Azure Data Factory](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-azure-adf.md).This topic shows how to move data from an on-premise SQL Server database to a Azure SQL database via Azure Blob Storage using ADF.
trans-unit.target: The procedure for moving data to an Azure SQL database with Azure Data Factory (ADF) is provided in the topic [Move data from an on-premise SQL server to SQL Azure with Azure Data Factory](machine-learning-data-science-move-sql-azure-adf.md).This topic shows how to move data from an on-premise SQL Server database to a Azure SQL database via Azure Blob Storage using ADF.

trans-unit.source: Consider using ADF when data needs to be continually migrated in a hybrid scenario that accesses both on-premise and cloud resources, and when the data is transacted or needs to be modified or have business logic added to it in the course of being migrated.
trans-unit.target: Consider using ADF when data needs to be continually migrated in a hybrid scenario that accesses both on-premise and cloud resources, and when the data is transacted or needs to be modified or have business logic added to it in the course of being migrated.

trans-unit.source: ADF allows for the scheduling and monitoring of jobs using simple JSON scripts that manage the movement of data on a periodic basis.
trans-unit.target: ADF allows for the scheduling and monitoring of jobs using simple JSON scripts that manage the movement of data on a periodic basis.

trans-unit.source: ADF also has other capabilities such as support for complex operations.
trans-unit.target: ADF also has other capabilities such as support for complex operations.
